name: MIND GAME
description:
Mind Game is a platformer game where you can play the role of a cat trying to overcome his fears. With this game created during the NN Game Jam, the development team tried to illustrate how our fears and emotions can prevent us from moving on in life. 

Enjoy this symbolic story while feeling encouraged to overpower your hesitations and interrogations in real life.

Team leader : Muriel Tramis
Game Design / Programmers : Captain Carter, Divine Madness & Zayd Carelse
Narrative Designer : Jennifer Lufau
Sound Designer : Aalliyah Ma
